summary: Encapsulates an end-to-end text-to-speech pipeline that combines a FastSpeech2 acoustic model with a Conformer encoder and a HiFi-GAN neural vocoder, enabling fast generation of high-fidelity speech from raw text.
business_intent: Provide a ready-to-use, high-quality speech synthesis solution for products such as virtual assistants, audiobooks, and any application requiring natural-sounding, low-latency voice output.
